display_long_description:
Dash through vast, dark caves, leaping over chasms and overcoming obstacles, all the while, exploring new exciting areas. Your goal: head to the Crystal Castle by collecting shimmering crystals and hidden keys to unlock ancient gates, each one leading to more challenging and mysterious areas of the cave system. By unlocking hidden areas and finding objects that lay throughout these maps, this will allow you to customize your avatar, making your look unique to other players. Use your AI assistant, Kira, who'll show you the way if things get tricky or if you find yourself in an area that's difficult to leave. It's an exciting game of race against other players and into the unknown!
[media]
[media]

Your goal: head to the Crystal Castle by collecting shimmering crystals and hidden keys to unlock ancient gates, each one leading to more challenging and mysterious areas of the cave system. By unlocking hidden areas and finding objects that lay throughout these maps, this will allow you to customize your avatar, making your look unique to other players. Use your AI assistant, Kira, who'll show you the way if things get tricky or if you find yourself in an area that's difficult to leave. It's an exciting game of race against other players and into the unknown!
